## DetailedFailure.onFailure() method

Invokes the supplied [failure callback](./ts-utils.detailedfailurecontinuation.md) and propagates its returned [DetailedResult&lt;T, TD&gt;](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onFailure(cb: DetailedFailureContinuation<T, TD>): DetailedResult<T, TD>;
```

cb


</td><td>

[DetailedFailureContinuation](./ts-utils.detailedfailurecontinuation.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, TD&gt;


</td><td>

The [failure callback](./ts-utils.detailedfailurecontinuation.md) to be invoked.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[DetailedResult](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, TD&gt;

The [DetailedResult&lt;T, TD&gt;](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md) returned by the failure callback.
